Other Information.Test Conditions: Saturated C60 solution in toluene at 60 °C for 7 days
Other Information.Additional Info: C60 occupies approximately half of the cavities, leading to ZnTCPP/C60 charge transfer interaction

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion based on cavity dimensions

Experimental Validation.Method: Photovoltaic performance measurement, UV-Vis spectroscopy, photoluminescence studies
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Undoped PPF-11/ZnO film: JSC = 4.65 mA/cm², VOC = 470 mV, PCE = 0.86%; C60-doped PPF-11/ZnO film: JSC = 1.05 mA/cm², VOC = 298 mV, PCE = 0.17%

Other Information.Additional Info: The [100]-oriented PPF-11 films displayed superior photovoltaic performance compared to control devices and previously reported MOF-based solar cells.
